title: Anthocyanin profiling of genetically diverse pigmented potato (Solanum tuberosum L.) clonal accessions from north-eastern sub-Himalayan plateau of India
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Jammugani Vinod Kumar, Riman Saha Chowdhury, Prudveesh Kantamraju, Subir Dutta, Kumaresh Pal, Srinjoy Ghosh, Simanta Das, Rupsanatan Mandal, Suchand Datta, Ashok Choudhury, Somnath Mandal, Nandita Sahana
